prodNameC: 邦迪斯迷你那夫人類免疫球蛋白 G2 套組
ingredientsDesc:
MININEPH HUMAN IgG2 ANTISERUM
This has been adsorbed to monospecificity for IgG2 and is supplied in stabilised liquid form. It contains 0.099% sodium azide, 0.1% EACA and 0.01% benzamidine as preservatives.
MININEPH IgG2 SWIPE CARD
This is encoded with details of the reaction curve specific to the respective lot of antiserum. This card is antiserum lot specific and must be used only with this lot of antiserum.

MININEPH IgG2 BUFFER
For use with this lot of IgG2 reagent only. Contains 0.099% Sodium azide as a preservative.
MININEPH HUMAN IgG2 HIGH AND LOW CONTROLS
These consist of pooled normal human serum and are supplied in stabilised liquid form. They contain 0.099% sodium azide, 0.1% EACA and 0.01% benzamidine as preservatives.
applicantName: 太暘生物科技股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 新北市汐止區福德三路369號12樓
efficacy: 試劑組提供體外檢測人體血清當中的免疫球蛋白質IgG亞型：IgG2，可協助臨床診斷人體內IgG2不正常的代謝情況，套組適用於MININEPH TM 濁度計做為實驗操作平台。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.5510 免疫球蛋白A，G，M，D及E免疫試驗系統

factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: 8 CALTHORPE ROAD, EDGBASTON, BIRMINGHAM B15 1QT, UNITED KINGDOM
